alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 09 at 6:23AM CDT until May 09 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR NORTHWESTERN CRAWFORD COUNTY... At 623 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Walnut and Hepler. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
